global.channelNotFound: Something went wrong and I didn't got the channel from discord.
global.noBotPermsSend: I do not have permission to send messages in that channel!
global.noBotPermsEdit: I do not have permission to edit that channel!
global.noUserPerms: You do not have permission to use this command!
global.streamerNotFound:
This streamer does not exist!

<:RoleIcon:1118592777454899302> **Note:** You can find the **username** at the end of a stream link.
*Example: <https://kick.com/username> <=*
global.subLeaderboardNotFound:
This streamer does not have a sub leaderboard!

<:RoleIcon:1118592777454899302> **Note:** You can find the **username** at the end of a stream link.
*Example: <https://kick.com/username> <=*
global.optionStreamer: The username of the streamer you want.
global.optionChannel: The channel you want to send the message to.
global.optionMessage: The message you want to send when the streamer goes live.
global.optionCleanUp: Clean up the message after the streamer goes offline. (Deletes old message)
global.optionFilters: Filter out live notifications by title keywords. Separate with commas: keyword1, keyword2
global.optionFilterType: Define how the filter should work.
global.filterTypeExclude: Exclude live notifications with the keywords.
global.filterTypeInclude: Only include live notifications with the keywords.
global.invalidFilterType: The filter type is invalid! Please use either `exclude` or `include`.
global.serverOnly: This command can only be used in a server!
global.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching the streamer! Please try again later.
global.fetchErrorLeaderboard: An error occurred while fetching the streamer leaderboard! Please try again later.
global.cleanUpAndOfflineMessage: You can't set a offline message and enable clean up at the same time! (It would edit and delete the message.)
global.notTracked: This streamer is not being tracked in this server!
global.onlyServer: This command can only be used in a server!
global.errorOccurred: An error occurred while executing the command!
global.cooldown: You are on cooldown please wait a second.
global.alreadyHaveSubRole: You already have the sub role!
global.invalidSync: Either **{streamer}** is no longer a valid kick user or **{kickUser}** is no longer a valid kick user!
global.notSubscriber: You are not a subscriber of {streamer}!
global.byAddingRoleError:
While trying to add the subscriber role I got a error!
*Error: {error}*
global.defaultNotification:
<:O_:1118592785642180698> [[STREAMER]] is now live!
<:LinkIcon:1118592789488349325> Watch it here: [[URL]]

problems.missingPermissions: [Seems like you are asking yourself why the bot response with "Missing Permissions". To find more information about this, please click here.](https://kick.bot/guide/permissions)

premiumMessages.discordPremium: To cancel premium bought on Discord, you need to go into your Discord settings.
premiumMessages.premiumCommandInfo: To buy premium, use the </premium:1164829878626029639> command.
premiumMessages.cancelDone: Premium has been canceled and you wont get charged again. You can still use the premium features until {cancel_at}.
premiumMessages.onlyOwnerCanCancel: Only the person who bought the premium can cancel it!
premiumMessages.hasPremium: You already have premium. You can use the button below to cancel it.
premiumMessages.noPremium: This command is only available for premium servers!
premiumMessages.premiumHint: Enjoying the bot? Unlock more with Premium! Click the button below to upgrade.
premiumMessages.streamerLimit: Hey! You reached the maximum amount of streamers you can track on this server. You can upgrade to premium to below!
premiumMessages.counterLimit: Hey! You reached the maximum amount of counters you can track on this server. You can upgrade to premium to below!
premiumMessages.leaderboardLimit: Hey! You reached the maximum amount of leaderboards you can track on this server. You can upgrade to premium to below!
premiumMessages.subscriberRolesLimit: Hey! You reached the maximum amount of subscriber roles on this server. You can upgrade to premium to below!
premiumMessages.offlineMessage: Hey! You need to own premium to set a offline message!

giftLeaderboard.title: Subs Leaderboard of {streamerId}
giftLeaderboard.infoText: Opens a new tab and the kick profile from {username}

verification.title: Verify your Kick.com account
verification.verifyDescription:
In order to verify your Kick account please connect your Kick account by visiting this link: 
# {linkToVerify}
verification.helpText: If you have any questions, feel free to contact the bot support on Discord
verification.runningConnect: Kick.bot is now checking for your Kick.com account. Please wait a moment.
verification.couldNotFetchTheUser: I could not fetch your Kick.com user. Please try again later.
verification.couldNotFetchTheChannel: I could not fetch your Kick.com channel. Please try again later.
verification.connectedTo: Your Discord account is now connected to **{username}**.
verification.connectedAndGotSubscriberRole: Your Discord account is now connected to **{username}** and you got the subscriber role for **{streamer}**!
verification.connectedButNotASubscriber: Your Discord account is now connected to **{username}** but you are not a subscriber of **{streamer}** so you didn't get the subscriber role.
verification.connectedButErrorByAddingRole:
Your Discord account is now connected to **{username}** but I got a error while trying to add the subscriber role. 
Error: {error}
verification.kickWelcomeMessage: Hello {username}! I'm the #1 Kick x Discord Integration. You are now linked with your Discord account {discordUsername}. If you have any questions, feel free to join the support server at https://discord.gg/ZVERh35 !

commandData.description: Add a new streamer to the bot!

addCommand.alreadyTracked: This streamer is already being tracked!
addCommand.added: **{streamer}** has been added to the bot!

commandData.description: add / remove or update a follower counter channel for a streamer.
commandData.addDescription: add a follower counter channel for a streamer.
commandData.editDescription: edit a follower counter channel for a streamer.
commandData.removeDescription: remove a follower counter channel for a streamer.
commandData.listDescription: list all follower counter channels for this server.
commandData.optionChannel: The channel that should have the follower counter.
commandData.optionChannelRemove: The channel that is attached to the streamer you want to remove.
commandData.optionName: The name of the counter. [Channel Name]

counterCommand.alreadyCounter: This channel is already a counter!
counterCommand.noMessageEdit: You must provide message to edit!
counterCommand.noCounter: This channel is not a counter!
counterCommand.removed:
<#{channel}> has been removed as counter!
*Was added by <@{addedById}>.*
counterCommand.noCounters: There are no counters on this server!

commandData.description: Edit a streamer's configuration!

editCommand.noMessageOrChannel: You must provide a channel, message or the clean-up option to edit!

commandData.description: See the last 20 errors that happened in the bot on your server!

errorsCommand.noErrors: There are no errors to show!
errorsCommand.lastTitle: Last 20 errors that happened in this server.
errorsCommand.cantExplain: If you cant explain yourself the errors, please join our support server: https://discord.gg/ZVERh35

commandData.description: Get a link to the web guide of Kick Bot!

guideCommand.infoText:
### Kick Discord Bot Guide
<:wink:1118617302615720138> [Click here to get to the web guide of the bot.](<https://guide.kick.bot?utm_source=discord-in-app/> "Opens a new tab with guide.kick.bot")

commandData.description: Get help with the bot!

helpCommand.into: <:wink:1118617302615720138> [Kick Bot](<https://kick.bot?utm_source=discord-in-app>) is a Discord bot that allows you to track [Kick](<https://kick.com> "Opens a new tab with kick.com") streamers and get notified when they go live!
helpCommand.madeBy: Made by [Sean Sattler](<https://sattler.dev> "Opens a new tab with sattler.dev")
helpCommand.notAffiliated: *Not affiliated with <:Kick_Green:1118592781930221648> [Kick](<https://kick.com> "Opens a new tab with kick.com")*

commandData.description: See the bot insights!
Want to invite the bot to your server? Use this command!

inviteCommand.inviteText: <:PlusIcon:1118592778897719347> **[Click here to invite the bot to your server!](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1118578278299611246&permissions=275146828816&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fkick.bot%3Futm_source%3Ddiscord-app-invite&response_type=code&scope=bot%20applications.commands%20identify "Opens a new tab with the invite link!")**

commandData.optionStreamerRemove: The username of the streamer you want to remove.
commandData.listDescription: list all leaderboards for this server.
commandData.addDescription: add a leaderboard for a streamer.
commandData.removeDescription: remove a leaderboard for a streamer.
commandData.editDescription: edit a leaderboard for a streamer.

leaderboardCommand.alreadyLeaderboard: This streamer have already a leaderboard!
leaderboardCommand.sendError:
While trying to send the leaderboard I got a error!

leaderboardCommand.added: <#{channel}> is now a leaderboard channel for **{streamer}**!
leaderboardCommand.channelOrStyle: You must provide a channel or style to edit!
leaderboardCommand.noLeaderboard: This streamer don't have a leaderboard!
leaderboardCommand.noLeaderboards: There are no leaderboards on this server!

commandData.description: Link your Kick.com account to your Discord account!
View all streamers being tracked by the bot on this server!

listCommand.emptyList: There are no setup streamers on this server!

commandData.description: Remove a streamer from the bot!
commandData.optionStreamer: The username of the streamer you want to remove.

removeCommand.removed:
**{streamer}** has been removed from the bot!
*Was added by <@{addedById}>.*

commandData.description: Add a subscriber role to a streamer.
commandData.optionStreamer: The username of the streamer where the subscribers should be able to get the role.
commandData.optionRole: The role you want to give to the subscribers.
commandData.optionMessage: A message if you want to have a custom message.
commandData.optionOfflineMessage: A message if the streamer is offline.
commandData.descriptionExpiration: Set the expiration time for the subscriber role.
commandData.optionTime: The time in days when the subscriber role get removed after the user unsubscribed.

embed.title: Subscriber role for
embed.description: To get the subscriber role of **{streamer}** you just need to click on the button below with the name **Sub Role**.

subscriberRoleCommand.added:
I have sent the subscriber role embed to <#{channel}>!
*Info: If you want to delete the setup, use </subscriber role remove:1170402380270014584>.*
subscriberRoleCommand.error:
While trying to send the subscriber role embed I got a error!
*Error: {error}*
subscriberRoleCommand.noPremiumForExpiration: You need to have premium to set the expiration time for the subscriber role.
subscriberRoleCommand.expiration: The subscriber role will now be removed after {time} days. (Note: If they subscribe again, Kick Bot wont remove the role!)
subscriberRoleCommand.notFound: This streamer does not have a subscriber role!
subscriberRoleCommand.deleted: The subscriber role setup for **{streamer}** has been deleted!
subscriberRoleCommand.alreadySetup: This streamer already have a subscriber role setup!

commandData.description: Get the invite to the support!

supportCommand.supportText:
<:QuestionMarkicon:1118592784509698149> Need help? Join the support server!
https://discord.gg/ZVERh35

commandData.description: Get a list of all variables you can use in your message!

variablesCommand.url: The streamer's stream URL. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.vodid: The streamer's VOD ID. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.title: The stream title.
variablesCommand.image: The stream thumbnail. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.new_line: A new line. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.created_at: The stream creation date. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.default_message: The default message. (Not available at counters!)
variablesCommand.streamer_image: The streamer's avatar. (Not available at counters!)

commandData.description: Test your live notification.
commandData.optionStreamer: The username of the streamer you want to test.

testCommand.tested:
Test message for **{streamer}** has been sent!
Keep in mind that the bot always use test data for this.
testCommand.error:
While trying to send the test message I got a error!
*Error: {error}*

commandData.description: Get a Discord user from a Kick user

ktdCommand.notInOurDatabase: This Kick user is not in our database!
ktdCommand.notInDiscord: I can't find a Discord user with this Kick user!
ktdCommand.success:
### Kick to Discord
- Discord User: {username} (`{id}`)
- Discord User Avatar: [CLICK](<{avatar}>)

commandData.description: Get a Kick user from a Discord user

dtkCommand.notInOurDatabase: This Discord user is not in our database!
dtkCommand.notInKick: I can't find a Kick user with this Discord user!
dtkCommand.success:
### Discord to Kick
- Kick User: {username} (`{id}`)
- Kick User Avatar: [CLICK](<{avatar}>)
- Kick User Biography: 
>>> {bio}

commandData.description: With this command you can subscribe to the premium plan.

premiumCommand.premiumCheckout: Click on the button below to get to the checkout page. After the payment the premium will be activated on your server.

commandData.description: Use this command to fully delete your data from the bot.

dmdCommand.deleted: Your data has been deleted from the bot. If you want to use the bot again, you need to link your account again.

commandData.description: Toggle if Kick bot uses only Discord’s permissions.

ignorePermissionsCommand.willIgnore: Kick bot will now defer permission checks to Discord. Manage command access via the [Server Integrations Page](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360045093012-Server-Integrations-Page>).
ignorePermissionsCommand.willNotIgnore: Kick bot will now enforce its own permission checks. Use the [Server Integrations Page](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360045093012-Server-Integrations-Page>) to manage permissions.
